title: Makeup Brush Holder, XREXS 26 Holes Brush Drying Holder With Beautiful Crystal Clear Acrylic Base, Collapsible Air Drying Tower Cosmetics Brush Tree
features: Fantastic Makeup Brush Drying Tree---- This rack has silicone openings that can hold various sized cosmetic brushes., It can accommodate up to 26 brushes .(4 large, 6 medium, and 16 small brushes)

Sturdy Makeup Brush Drying Rack in Unique Design ----The sturdy brush holder with a beautiful crystal clear acrylic base, this design is so much better than the others, it is tall enough to put brushes in from the bottom without having to pick up the entire stand

Makes Drying Your Make Up Brushes Much Easier----This brush stand speeds up the drying time as well since all the water is allowed to fall out via natural gravity. It makes it so easy to dry brushes the proper way after washing and preserve them without letting water get in and damage them
Easy to Take Apart for Storage or Travel---- It is so easy to take apart for storage or travel and takes up little space. It's collapsible for easy storage when not in use
Not Only a Makeup Brushes Holder---- It is also a very good painting brush drying rack holder holds every long handles brush for drying. Very hand for your multiple brush sets and saves space
